title: The Quiet Revolution of the Soul: Explorations in Divine Love
features: We all want to go to Heaven but most of us have trouble understanding what Heaven really is and have no idea how to get there. This book provides a road map to Heaven. Angels are eager to help us on our way and a connection with these beautiful souls is possible. The key is in receiving a unique blessing from the Creator. The Divine Love from God is free for whoever desires it. This book touches on subjects such as: what is soul, the nature of God, descriptions of the spirit world and Heaven. The origin of this information comes from Angels communicating through individuals who are gifted with mediumship. The Quiet Revolution of the Soul invites the reader to a journey of awakening through the transformational effects of receiving Divine Love.
description: Albert J. Fike is a retired landscape gardener living on the West Coast of Canada. He now devotes much of his time teaching and praying with others for the blessings of Divine Love. Together with his wife Jeanne, he has travelled to more than 60 countries, where they have shared their spiritual perspectives in the form of workshops, prayer gatherings, spiritual retreats and conversations. When not travelling or writing, Al tends to his garden and is a potter. He has been praying for Divine Love for over forty years and is an ordained minister in the Foundation Church of Divine Truth.

Fike has been writing books on spirituality, mediumship and explorations in soul consciousness for the past decade. He is a retired landscape gardener living in a small seaside village on the west coast of Canada. Having travelled extensively, he and his wife Jeanne have conducted workshops, spiritual retreats and presentations in many countries as well as online, sharing his experiences and encounters with Celestial Angels. As a gifted medium, Al has channeled over 2,000 messages from bright spirits and has authored several books containing their wisdom. His most recent book entitled "Our World in Transition-- Messages from Jesus", is a collection of teachings received through trance mediumship over a six month period. As with his previous books, these writings invite diverse seekers from around the world to awaken their soul consciousness towards spiritual truth.']}
